Package food.model

Interface ModelFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModelFacadeImpl
    public interface ModelFacade
    Interface representing the Facade that covers all Model aspects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Attaches a new FoodListObserver object.

      Retrieves the nutritional information for the given food item and updates the observers.

      Adds getNutrition() to the list of tasks to be executed.

      Searches for matching food items and updates the observers.
      void sendMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Sends the provided message and updates the observers on the outcome.
      void stop()
      Ends the worker thread method.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        void search​(java.lang.String term,
            boolean useCache,
            boolean quick)
        Searches for matching food items and updates the observers.
        Parameters:
        term - The term to search on.
        useCache - Whether to use cached data.
        quick - Whether to run a quick search.

      • getNutrition

        void getNutrition​(java.lang.String foodID,
                  java.lang.String measure,
                  boolean useCache)
        Retrieves the nutritional information for the given food item and updates the observers.
        Parameters:
        foodID - The associated food item.
        measure - The size of the nutritional information.
        useCache - Whether to use cached data.

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Sends the provided message and updates the observers on the outcome.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send.

      • run

        void run()
        The method run inside Worker thread.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Ends the worker thread method.

      • queueSearch

        void queueSearch​(java.lang.String term,
                 boolean useCache,
                 boolean quick)
        Adds search() to the list of tasks to be executed.
        Parameters:
        term - The term the task will use.
        useCache - Whether the task will use cached data.
        quick - Whether the task will use a quick search.

      • queueGetNutrition

        void queueGetNutrition​(java.lang.String foodID,
                       java.lang.String measure,
                       boolean useCache)
        Adds getNutrition() to the list of tasks to be executed.
        Parameters:
        foodID - The food item the task will use.
        measure - The size the task will use.
        useCache - Whether the task will use cached data.

      • queueSendMessage

        void queueSendMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Adds sendMessage() to the list of tasks to be executed.
        Parameters:
        message - The message the task will send.
